short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ParallelText compares text, JSON, and SQL with difference highlighting

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A modern text comparison application that streamlines the process of identifying differences between text snippets, code, and documents. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, ParallelText offers both a web interface and Chrome extension for seamless integration into developers' workflows. The application features real-time comparison, multiple format support (Plain Text, JSON, SQL), and intelligent difference highlighting.
